remarks: Distribute the unabbreviated form of proper substitution in and out of a conjunction. ~ 2uasbanh is derived from ~ 2uasbanhVD .  (Contributed by Alan Sare, 31-May-2014.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
2uasbanh.1 $e |- ( ch <-> ( E. x E. y ( ( x = u /\ y = v ) /\ ph ) /\ E. x E. y ( ( x = u /\ y = v ) /\ ps ) ) ) $.
2uasbanh $p |- ( E. x E. y ( ( x = u /\ y = v ) /\ ( ph /\ ps ) ) <-> ( E. x E. y ( ( x = u /\ y = v ) /\ ph ) /\ E. x E. y ( ( x = u /\ y = v ) /\ ps ) ) ) $.
$d u x $.
$d u y $.
$d v x $.
$d v y $.
